Title: power system notes
Text:
Precautions for Induction Energy Storage Module
1. Operators should pay attention to the fact that the different colors of the Induction Cell correspond to different voltages and must be matched with the corresponding energy storage slots.
2. The voltage of the Induction Cell can be changed through the variable sensing device to meet the demand.
3. Due to lack of maintenance, there may be obstacles near the module, which should be cleared before use.
Example:
Ruins (can be cleared directly)
Bush Trap (can be destroyed by bursting Tacetite)
Tacetite (can be destroyed by activating Tacetite Lightning)
